sentences.sentence: And wherever you are, I will find you. And I will bring you home.
sentences.translation: 不管你在哪儿，我都会找到你。我会把你带回家！

sentences.sentence: Continuous improvement is better than delayed perfection.
sentences.translation: 持续的改进，胜过延迟的完美。

sentences.sentence: As terrifying and painful as reality can be, it's also the only place where you can get a decent meal.
sentences.translation: 虽然现实会令人恐惧，令人痛苦，但它仍然是唯一一个能够让你吃到一顿大餐的地方。

sentences.sentence: Color my life with the chaos of trouble.
To realise the value of one millisecond, ask the athlete who has won a silver medal in the Olympics.
sentences.translation: 要体会到千分之一秒的价值，就去问一个刚在奥林匹克运动会上获得银牌的运动员。
